MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML6 postcode area of Airdrie. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.25pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived Kennyhill substation and suspect the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:23pm on 12th January 2021.
